section.heading: Pleading.
section.text: In a derivative action to enforce a right of a limited cooperative association, the complaint shall state:

para.text: The date and content of the plaintiff’s demand under § 29-1013.01(1) and the association’s response;
If 90 days have not expired since the demand, how irreparable harm to the association would result by waiting for the expiration of 90 days;
If the association agreed to bring an action demanded, that the action has not been brought within a reasonable time; and
If the demand should be excused as futile, the reasons therefor.

annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-210 added (4) and made related changes.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 1303 of the Uniform Limited Cooperative Association Act.
Application of Law 19-210: Section 7 of D.C. Law 19-210 provided that the act shall apply as of January 1, 2012.
